content: The nursery school originally started in 2019, but officially opened its doors as Little Light Academy on 1st February 2019 where Mrs. Samantha Gumede (Former Owner) and Mrs. Thenjiwe Mohale (Owner & Principal) have grown it to the status that it is today. Little Light Academy is a Christian based nursery school teaching Bible principles. Little Light Academy is a warm, nurturing, and fun place to be.
